about.title: About ARC
about.subtitle: Built for aspirants. Optimized for learning.
about.body: ARC is a daily practice platform for Reading Comprehension. It delivers two high-quality passages every day, provides instant results, and offers detailed analysis to help you improve faster.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.body: By using ARC, you agree to practice respectfully, not redistribute content, and accept that the service is provided as-is during the pilot. See the README for contact details.
